title: Get-Paid.com
author: Get-Paid.com
content: Ripple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†No.If we were in other forums, after the word I have written above, but as in this forum there is a great concern for quality and a single word can be considered low value I will tell you that not in your dreams I will exchange Bitcoin for the shitcoin of the banks:"Ripple collaborates with financial institutions worldwide; more than 100 financial institutions have joined RippleNet, including: Santander (USA) Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce (Canada) Kotak Mahindra Bank (India)"AWS Partner Profile: Ripple

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Ripple can not affect Bitcoin but the opposite, Bitcoin affects Ripple is true.Ripple was constrained too long by the SEC law suit and we know the habit of Ripple when it rises after accumulation. When it rises, it is rising like a bomb and would kill all shorters. However, such rises only occur after so many months of accumulation.Bitcoin temporarily is in its accumulation and we can not expect too high recovery at the moment. When lot of people expect of recovery, it won't recover strongly. We must wait for angry phase when most of people lose faith and hope, then suddenly Bitcoin will start its show.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: xrp is good to use. like withdrawing or sending money to someone abroad but holding it as investment for a long time will not be a good idea knowing that Garlinghouse is like Hoskinson who had billions of their own token who could dump to its investors.its good to know they are winning against SEC because if they are not going to win, a lot of altcoins may not have the chance to win against SEC.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I think what do you need to do is to see bitcoin as the leading coin always so having a different reaction on the market with lead to differences in the prices ¬†and if you treat it as different asset, ¬†then you might want to always get both if you have the capacity to do so.If I want to be speculative, then I would buy it also.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: The US dollar is getting stronger. That's why all the stablecoin shitcoins backed by US dollars are getting stronger. This is temporary.Ripple isn't a stablecoin, but it shares some similarities with the stablecoins.Why do you think that Ripple would go to the moon? Ripple doesn't have any scarcity that could cause the price to hit a massive bull run.Stablecoins like USDT and USDC being at the 3rd and 4th place in terms of market cap is a sign that the crypto winter will continue and many traders simply don't want to take risks and invest in the more volatile coins.

comments.author: adzino
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†Now? Nope. It would be too risky. This is how most people loses their money. They FOMO everything have into coins that are trending and then they end up losing everything because they invest at the wrong moment. Never buy the news. If it is already trending, then high chance you are already very late.The price of XRP already went up 70% within the last few days. Too risky to be investing now since there are lot of long term holders who have been waiting for this moment to pass on their bag and exit with their profits.

comments.author: Stella Mese
comments.body: XRP does continue to show a green candle or has a rapid rise after the news of the XRP and Sec dispute in the trial seems to be almost over. but I still don't dare to enter XRP. I will wait for bitcoin correction first. because if XRP is now up. but if bitcoin is experiencing a correction then XRP will also be corrected.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: FACTIf XRP surges in this type of market situation it's only temporary, as time goes on XRP will join the crew of dumping projects in the crypto space, once we are in a bear market any coins that pump will dump, good news is not enough to keep a project surging in a bear market.

comments.author: Davian144
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†No, that's not the only reason to choose Ripple and forget about Bitcoin, even though Ripple is pumping at the moment and ranks 6th as a cryptocurrency. Bitcoin remains the first to be seen for anyone to own, because Bitcoin will still be at its best at this time. And if that choice were made for me, maybe I would choose both without forgetting Bitcoin. Because to me it would be very silly to have to leave Bitcoin just because of the current price drop and choose another one (Ripple) just because there is a pump in the price.

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†If you think like that about Ripple, that's your right, but if you have to make a choice for everyone between Bitcoin and Ripple, surely everyone will choose Bitcoin in their long term investment, I will also think the same as them to hold Bitcoin as an investment my long term, compared to holding Ripple, because Bitcoin is verifiable and has a bright future and the supply of Bitcoins will not be reprintable while Ripple has a very large supply and can still be reprinted by developers and very risky with my investment.

comments.author: budi691
comments.body: I didn't think for a short time when I saw the green XRP price that I would go to XRP and leave Bitcoin, because I'm sure XRP won't have a scarcity that could lead to a massive price hike, anything can happen, if you want to take the risk don't there's nothing wrong with trying

comments.author: bounceback
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†Maybe with the good news for XRP coin this time, I don't think it's too bad for us to make the coin as a short-term investment because news like that of course will usually make the price movement will experience a temporary increase caused by the "buy rumors sell news" scenario, so be wise when you want to invest with this coin and I personally would never want to change the BTC I currently have with XRP.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMWould you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†I consider to invest thousands of bucks to this coin to anticipate when the bullish will come again when it has a good news from the battle against SEC. This time it's still remain speculation. People buy in rumour and sell for the news. that's pretty much the same like what happened in luna. People bought for the rumour about burn but they were also selling it after the news if south korea government wanna jail do kwon. In my opinion if this pump was temporary and a good time to take profit and waiting for another dip to come.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: I prefer to invest in bitcoin than in XRP, but I admitted that I still have few amounts of XRP, and I only want to sell it at the highest price. If the price can increase so high in the next few weeks and I see an opportunity to sell at that price, I will sell it and search for other coins to invest in. It is like a short-term investment for XRP. If you want to invest in XRP, just be careful and not use too big money as we don't know what will happen later. You can select the other coins if you are unsure where to invest.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†I may consider buying some XRP for another reason, not because I preferred to hold it. Look, even to say that they are winning in their SEC issue but this won't change the view of this coin and it was too far to compare to Bitcoin and even ETH. You don't get wrong with what you think about this project. Well, I don't weight much on its rank but certainly, I'd just look to the projects that are really capable to do a good market because, in the end, this will affect our profit margin.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high...It is premature to say that Ripple won in court, we should wait for the end of the trial. At the moment, the price of XRP has reached its local maximum and has gone for a correction. Thus, you should not buy a coin at a high price, and need to wait until its price reaches a minimum.

comments.author: Detritus
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†I can get a cup of coffee ‚òï, a box of pizza üçï or shawarma and pay with Bitcoin but I can't exchange my Bitcoin to buy Ripple. Perhaps you should have compare Ripple to another Altcoin and not Bitcoin.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†Bitcoin though has gathered some momentum and reaches $19k, so that is good enough for the market this weekend.As for Ripple, obviously the goes really bring the market to the limelight again, rising as high as 25% initially. But it has somewhat levelling now. But I'm not sure though, it's it late to invest because it has risen again? for the long term? Maybe, but it is still in the gray area and the battle will continue and we really don't know what will be the outcome.

comments.author: Marvell1
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on September 23, 2022, 04:05:05 AMRipple has success in court and that is why the currency is flying high.Take into consideration the 3rd and 4th largest Cryptos as of today are USDT and USDC and Ripple can soon go to the moon.Would you consider investing now in Ripple instead of Bitcoin?!¬†There is a lot of evidence that the outcome of the lawsuit will be in XRP's favor, but there is still a possibility that XRP will lose the case, nothing is certain until the final statement of the court. So those who want to invest should still wait, no need to rush.XRP winning the lawsuit will have an impact on its price in the short term but there is no guarantee in the long term, if XRP continues to develop its project seriously its future has hope. Remember it is a centralized blockchain and is applied in financial institutions like banks, many people don't like this because of that, its development is still a question.
